title: Fecal Terror
description: This edition is no long available. Please see other edition.A killer turd is on the loose! Barry Gilbert is fed up with getting picked on and tired of not having a girlfriend. He learns how to summon a demon, but screws up the ritual. Benzonah, demon of the seven Hells, is born deep within Barry’s bowels. After a major stomachache, the demon, constituted of fecal matter, is excreted. The demon does Barry’s bidding, exacting revenge, and acquiring the girl of Barry’s dreams. But little does Barry know the demon has plans of his own.
author: David   Bernstein
